entry.title: National Capital Region Trail Monitoring and Analysis Program

link.title: National Capital Region Trail Monitoring and Analysis Program

entry.content:
For the past couple of years we have been working with UNC and VT on the National Capital Region Trail Monitoring and Analysis Program. The program is funded by the National Parks Service and consists of several regional partners within the DC, MD, and VA region.

To learn more about the project, check out our article about the project and the projectâ€™s homepage.
entry.summary: Fig. 1. Count locations within the National Capital Region

entry.title: Region-level dashboard now available
entry.content: Now available on the Dashboard page, you can select to view a dashboard on a regional level. The regions are pre-defined based on our project partners. Let us know what you think!
entry.summary: Now available on the Dashboard page, you can select to view a dashboard on a regional level. The regions are pre-defined based on our project partners. Let us know what you think!

entry.title: Switch to GitHub Pages
entry.content: User documentation for BikePed Portal has been switched from a standard GitHub repository to using GitHub Pages using Minimal Mistakes theme.
entry.summary: User documentation for BikePed Portal has been switched from a standard GitHub repository to using GitHub Pages using Minimal Mistakes theme.
